title: N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 10.8 - False or misleading statements
content:
N.Y. Comp. Codes R. & Regs. Tit. 11 ยง 10.8 - False or misleading statements

State Regulations

No solicitation subject to this Part shall be made by means of any proxy statement, form of proxy, notice of meeting, or other communication, written or oral, containing any statement which at the time and in the light of the circumstances under which it is made, is false or misleading with respect to any material fact, or which omits to state any material fact necessary in order to make the statements therein not false or misleading or necessary to correct any statement in any earlier communication with respect to the solicitation of a proxy for the same meeting or subject matter which has become false or misleading. Notes
N.Y. Comp. Codes
R. & Regs. Tit. 11
ยง
10.8

State regulations are updated quarterly; we currently have two versions available. Below is a
comparison between our most recent version and the prior quarterly release. More comparison features will be added as we have more versions to compare. No prior version found.
